nodes.text: Endor I was one of the two stars located at the center of the Endor system in the Moddell sector of the Outer Rim Territories. The system's other star was named Endor II, and the pair was orbited by the gas giant Endor.

Endor I was first mentioned in the reference book Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, which was released in 2015. In the Expanded Universe, which was deemed non-canon on April 25, 2014, the Endor system only had one sun, called Ibleam.
